meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting the posture
meanings.sent1: Her postural habits greatly influence her back health.
meanings.sent2: Good postural alignment is important for overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the postural elegance of the swan.
meanings.sent4: The postural strength of the tree withstood the strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The postural guidance from the instructor helped improve his balance.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the position of the body
meanings.sent1: The postural changes in the patient's body were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: Proper postural adjustments can prevent muscle strain.
meanings.sent3: The postural puzzle game challenged players to hold unique poses.
meanings.sent4: His postural stance mirrored that of a soldier at attention.
meanings.sent5: The postural shift in her dance routine added grace to her movements.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or pertaining to posture
meanings.sent1: The postural analysis revealed areas of improvement.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's performance was hindered by poor postural control.
meanings.sent3: The postural parade featured participants showcasing different poses.
meanings.sent4: His postural demeanor exuded confidence and poise.
meanings.sent5: The postural assessment highlighted the need for corrective exercises.
